channel.title: Version 5.19 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.19.0 (2023-08-12) Enhancements [feature] highlight: add title parameter #616 [feature] variant: signal variant switch as event #614 [feature] variant: add zen variant 'n light an' dark #613 [feature] i18n: add Hungarian translat'n #604 [feature] mermaid: update t' 10.3.0 #601 Fixes [bug] siteparam: avoid halt if param be a map/slice #611 [bug] mermaid: fix broken zoom since update t' v10 #608 [bug] mermaid: variant generator diagram does not respond t' events #607 [bug] print: avoid chroma leak fer relearn-dark #605 Maintenance [task] mermaid: update t' 10.3.1 #610
